title.multiplayer.disabled: Keystone does not support Multiplayer. Please use a different profile without Keystone.
keystone.version_check.outdated: You are using an outdated version of Keystone!
keystone.version_check.currentVersion: You are using %s, the current version is %s
keystone.blacklist.tooltip: Blacklist: Matches every block not in the mask.
keystone.whitelist.tooltip: Whitelist: Only matches blocks in the mask.
keystone.nudge.tooltip: Click and hold. Use movement keys to nudge. Right click to move a larger distance.
keystone.selection_panel.deselect.toolti: Remove all selection boxes. Shortcut: Ctrl-D
keystone.selection_panel.deleteBlocks.to: Fill the selection with air. Shortcut: Del
Remove all entities within the selection
keystone.selection_panel.analyze.tooltip: Count the different blocks in the selection and display the total
keystone.selection_panel.cut.tooltip: Copy all blocks in the selection, then fill with air. Shortcut: Ctrl-X
keystone.selection_panel.copy.tooltip: Copy all blocks in the selection. Shortcut: Ctrl+C
keystone.selection_panel.paste.tooltip: Import the last item taken by Cut or Copy. Shortcut: Ctrl+P
keystone.selection_panel.export.tooltip: Save highlighted selection as a schematic
keystone.session.promptUncommitted: You have unsaved changes in this world. Would you like to save them?
keystone.filter_panel.runFilter.tooltip: Execute the filter on the current selection boxes.
keystone.brush.minimumSpacing.tooltip: The minimum distance between the brush positions.
keystone.brush.noise.tooltip: The percent chance that a block on the edge of the brush will be placed. Lower values make rougher shapes.
keystone.brush.immediateMode.tooltip: Immediate Mode: The brush is performed as you click and drag.
keystone.brush.deferredMode.tooltip: Deferred Mode: Clicking and dragging creates a set of positions. Releasing left-click performs the brush on all positions.
keystone.schematic_import.rotate.tooltip: Rotate all import boxes. Shortcut: R
keystone.schematic_import.mirror.tooltip: Mirror all import boxes. Shortcut: M
keystone.schematic_import.import.tooltip: Place all imported schematics. Shortcut: Enter
keystone.fill.mask.tooltip: Only blocks matching this mask will be replaced.
keystone.fill.palette.tooltip: The palette to use when filling the selection.
keystone.biomes.tooltip: Whether to change the biomes to the biomes in the schematic.
keystone.structure_voids.tooltip: If checked, structure void blocks will be placed in the world instead of ignored.
keystone.clone.repeat.tooltip: The number of times to perform the clone. Each clone operation is placed relative to the previous operation.
keystone.clone.copyAir.tooltip: If unchecked, air will not be copied when cloning the selection.
keystone.clone.clone.tooltip: Perform the clone operation. Shortcut: Enter
keystone.hud.block_updates.label: Block Updates:
